name: DAY/ONE
description:
DAY/ONE is a short prototype game made for Ludum Dare 45. The theme for the jam was 'Start with nothing.' 

In DAY/ONE, you play as a survivor of an unknown apocalyptic event, who has just re-surfaced from a shelter. As you progress through the game, you will pick up new members to your party, as well as weapons to help you defend yourselves. 

Controls: 

Use mouse to pick up items, fight and move your party by clicking. 

Left Click inventory slot - Use item.

Right Click inventory slot - Drop item.
